As ever, only time will tell whether or not Eric Schmidt 's reasons of simplifying management structure and speeding up decision making are akin to Alan Johnson 's`` personal reasons'' for quitting his job as shadow chancellor, but most right-minded people are likely to be leaning in the direction of not.
